author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two weeks after two teenagers and their mother were found dead inside an apartment in South Kolkata’s Palm Avenue area, police on Tuesday said the father of the children had admitted to the crime.

According to police, Neil Fonseca (49), the father of the two 16-year-olds twins, Darren and Joshua, and husband of Jessica Fonseca, was found to have sustained injuries on his throat and hand.

“He has admitted to murdering the three persons,” Debasish Boral Special Additional Commissioner of Kolkata Police (Crime) told journalists here.

Though the police did not elaborate on the motive behind the murder, senior officers said Fonseca was in heavy debt and reportedly had affair with another woman.

According to the police, in the early hours of January 16, Fonseca first killed his wife and then his two sons. The deceased had cut marks on throat and were found to bear injuries apparently sustained from a heavy blunt object.
title: Man admits to killing wife, twins in Kolkata: police
